original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.15. Hetuduka, Micchattaniyatattika🔽Hetuṁ micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  hetu duka micchat ta niyata ttika  hetum micchatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na micchatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sabbattha tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)🔽Nahetuṁ aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum sammatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sammatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sabbattha tīṇi 🔽na hetum aniyatam dhammam paccayā na na hetu na aniyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
